p:
The present results agree with those of Kure and Skaal
32 and Kure et al.
33 , who isolated 13 species of Penicillium, Alternaria, Aureobasidium, Cladosporium, Epicocum, Geotrichum, Mucor, Phoma, Trichoderma, and Ulocladium from semi-hard cheeses. In the same way, De Morais
34 isolated the genera Penicillium, Aspergillus niger, Rhizopus, Aspergillus ochraceus, and Mucor from butter cheese. Therefore, considering the fungal genera found in the contaminated cheese samples, subsequent steps of the study were performed with Cladosporium sp., Fusarium sp., and Penicillium sp.
